members.name: setBrightness
members.description: Sets the brightness of the display.

params.name: Floating
params.description: number between 0 and 1 in which case 1 means 100% brightness and 0 means 0% brightness.

members.name: getBrightness
members.description: Reads the current brightness of the device display.

members.name: setKeepScreenOn
members.description: Keeps the screen on. Prevents the device from setting the screen to sleep.
